trans-unit.source: Represents an entry in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog"></xref> custom place collection for [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Representa uma entrada num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog"> </xref> recolha local personalizado para [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição abrir e guardar caixas de diálogo num [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] tem uma área no lado esquerdo da caixa de diálogo intitulada **hiperligações favoritas**.

trans-unit.source: This area is called custom places.
trans-unit.target: Esta área é denominada personalizados locais.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a custom place.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe representa um local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: No [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/add/includes/winxp-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/add/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], esta classe não tem qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"> </xref> classe com um local personalizado identificado por um [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] GUID de pasta conhecida.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de disponíveis [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido pastas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecida para locais de personalizada de caixa de diálogo de ficheiro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ou o ficheiro KnownFolders.h o [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>que representa um [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pasta conhecida.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: with a specified folder path to a custom place.
trans-unit.target: com um caminho de pasta especificada para um local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Caminho da pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido GUID de pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that indicates the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Guid>que indica o [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pasta conhecida para o local personalizado.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: If the custom place was specified with a folder path, then an empty GUID is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o local personalizado foi especificado com um caminho de pasta, em seguida, é devolvido um GUID vazio.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de disponíveis [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido pastas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecida para locais de personalizada de caixa de diálogo de ficheiro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) ou o ficheiro KnownFolders.h o [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/add/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho da pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Caminho da pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If the custom place was specified with a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID, then an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o local personalizado foi especificado com um [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/add/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido GUID de pasta, em seguida, uma cadeia vazia será devolvido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace"> </xref> instância.
